name: Bubble Birds Pop!
description:
From the makers of Bubble Shoot Magic, Baby Witch & Bubble Blossom comes another Bubble Shooter adventure – Bubble Birds Pop!

The evil Witch has captured cute little birds and only you along with your friends Fox, Bunny and Kitty can rescue them and defeat the Witch. Use your skills to burst endless bubbles and be a part of the bubble shooting adventure.

Travel the world and get to see epic wonders like Statue of Liberty, Opera House, Colosseum, Eiffel Tower and more. Make your adventure even better by connecting to Facebook and playing with your friends to compare high scores in over 1500 free levels!


Bubble Birds Pop features:
-- Pop bubbles by matching 3 of them
-- Rescue cute little birds and defeat the mighty Witch
-- Travel the world with your friends and see the wonders like Statue of Liberty, Eiffel Tower, Colosseum and more
-- Play with cute animals like Fox, Bunny, Kitty and more
-- Compete with your Facebook friends on the leaderboards
-- User powerful boosters like Bomb, extra aim line, rainbow ball to clear harder levels
-- Play daily to get free rewards like powerups, coins and more
-- Save your progress on the cloud and play anywhere
-- Meet and unlock different birds and monsters in your journey as you go
-- Over 1500 levels of bubble shooting and fun and new levels added every month

Available in English, Français, Deutsche, Italiano, 中国, 日本語, 한국어, Türk, Español, Português, Русский, Dutch, Danish, Swedish
